modmenu.descriptionTranslation.fabulousc: Fabulous Clouds has 3 major features: vibrant clouds, customizable cloud layers, and procedurally generated cloud covers. Vibrant clouds make the clouds change color in sunrise/sunset similar to bedrock edition. Procedural cloud covers change how the clouds are shaped over time based on three presets: Clear, Normal, and Cloudy. Cloud layers be changed in the config file.
modmenu.summaryTranslation.fabulouscloud: This mod makes the clouds look much better and adds configurable cloud layers.
tooltip.fabulousclouds.vibrant_clouds: Clouds change color based on the fog color.
tooltip.fabulousclouds.vibrance_intensit: How much color clouds get in sunrises and sunsets.
tooltip.fabulousclouds.noise_clouds: Clouds and cloud covers change over time and are randomly generated.
tooltip.fabulousclouds.debug_noise_cloud: Adds the clouds.png texture to your F3 screen.
